title: "Machine learning hiring levels in apparel fell in May 2022"
excerpt: "The proportion of apparel supply chain companies hiring for machine learning-related positions dropped significantly in May 2022 compared with the equivalent month last year, with 31.2% of the companies included in our analysis recruiting for at least one such position."
